name: Reunion Hide & Seek
description:
In this you have collect your friends it has two playable levels so far and the second level you have to play with a friend that is with you at the moment are try and play with two hands it's up to you. 

Also you need to play the game in one sitting as once you start you won't be able to back out just so you know. 

Beware you might need to crab walk through some things.

Also Epilepsy Warning do not play it, if you have it.
